segments.text: Thomas , could you do me a favor ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Could you pick up Mrs . David from Ford Company at the Capital Airport ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm supposed to do it , but the general manager called me last night . He said he couldn ’ t come back to Beijing as scheduled , so he asked me to attend the meeting for him .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see . I'll do it for you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks a lot . It ’ s very kind of you .
segments.speaker: S1
